name: Henchmen
description:
Combo your way to a high score! Use your creativity and a variety of moves to express yourself in this freeform action game. It's a work in progress. There are lots of bugs and design problems, but the idea is there. I hope the core enjoyment is noticable from this. Please feel free to leave feedback in the comments.

How to play
Arrow Keys - Move
Z - Jump
X - Attack(Can be modified by holding UP or DOWN)
C - Grab
Shift - Dodge(Attacks can be performed out Dodge)
V - Counter(Ground counter can throw LEFT or RIGHT)
F - Call Assist

Objective
Hit the enemy with attacks to increase score.
Dropping the combo will reset the score.
To cash the score perform a grab.
Try to get as high of a cashed score as possible.
